code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={selectNewBoxerOpen:false,selectEditInfoOpen:false,selectCurrentBoxerOpen:{id:"",name:"",debut:"",retire:"",wins:"",losses:"",draws:"",imageName:"",info:""},newInfotoAppend:""};export var selectBoxerSlice=createSlice({name:"selectBoxer",initialState:initialState,reducers:{selectViewBoxer:function selectViewBoxer(state,action){state.selectNewBoxerOpen=true;state.selectCurrentBoxerOpen=action.payload;},deselectViewBoxer:function deselectViewBoxer(state,action){state.selectNewBoxerOpen=false;state.selectEditInfoOpen=false;state.selectCurrentBoxerOpen={id:"",name:"",debut:"",retire:"",wins:"",losses:"",draws:"",imageName:"",info:""};},boxerBeingViewed:function boxerBeingViewed(state,action){state.selectCurrentBoxerOpen=action.payload;},toggleEditInfoBar:function toggleEditInfoBar(state,action){state.selectEditInfoOpen=!state.selectEditInfoOpen;},setInfoBeingAdded:function setInfoBeingAdded(state,action){state.newInfotoAppend=action.payload;}}});var _selectBoxerSlice$act=selectBoxerSlice.actions,selectViewBoxer=_selectBoxerSlice$act.selectViewBoxer,deselectViewBoxer=_selectBoxerSlice$act.deselectViewBoxer,boxerBeingViewed=_selectBoxerSlice$act.boxerBeingViewed,toggleEditInfoBar=_selectBoxerSlice$act.toggleEditInfoBar,setInfoBeingAdded=_selectBoxerSlice$act.setInfoBeingAdded;export{selectViewBoxer,deselectViewBoxer,boxerBeingViewed,toggleEditInfoBar,setInfoBeingAdded};export var selectToViewBoxer=function selectToViewBoxer(state){return state.selectBoxer.selectNewBoxerOpen;};export var selectToEditInfo=function selectToEditInfo(state){return state.selectBoxer.selectEditInfoOpen;};export var selectCurrentBoxer=function selectCurrentBoxer(state){return state.selectBoxer.selectCurrentBoxerOpen;};export var selectNewInfoToAppend=function selectNewInfoToAppend(state){return state.selectBoxer.newInfotoAppend;};export default selectBoxerSlice.reducer;
